BTS.title: Two Year Technical Degree
BTS.option: in Digital System IT & Network option
content: Create Windows Forms app with C#, understand agil methods, learning to work in team to deliver a project from zero.
I learned basics of algorithms, basics of C, C++ & learned C#.

M2I.title: Professional Certificate in Web and Mobile Development
content: Beginning with Figma to create our UI/UX Designs
Learning all basics of front web development with HTML, CSS, Javascript.
Discover our first front web framework VueJS
The second part of my training is back-end development with PHP and SQL for our databases
In a second time we began working with Laravel and learn fundamentals about this stack.
I finished my training with NodeJS and MongoDB.
